mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, salt, real_name AS realname, gender, phone_number AS phonenumber, email, last_login_time AS lastlogintime, pwd_update_time AS pwdupdatetime, file_id AS fileid, is_locked AS islocked, remark, isvalid, ctime, creater, mtime, updater FROM sys_user WHERE isvalid = 1 AND id = #{id}
